comment: Those "finish the wall" signs at the recent Trump rallies shows without a doubt the level Trump's movement has sunk. It has become like a game show - the whole thing is entertainment at this point. It reminds me of the movie Running man back in the 's where just blatant lies and propaganda are told to cheering crowds.
